From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

"Well, I don't know how great a job I'm doing, but this should last
you." Beachcomber said, closing up the chest. He stood up and dusted his
hands off. He looked off into the beautful sun, and stared for a minute,
lost in its naturalistic charm.
